Body:
"""test that variables are pulled
        from 'enclosing' scope before context."""
t = Template(
    """
            <%
                x = 5
            %>
            <%def name="a()">
                this is a. x is ${x}.
            </%def>

            <%def name="b()">
                <%
                    x = 9
                %>
                this is b. x is ${x}.
                calling a. ${a()}
            </%def>

            ${b()}
"""
    )
eq_(flatten_result(t.render()),
    'this is b. x is 9. calling a. this is a. x is 5.')
